titles.title: To amend the Reclamation States Emergency Drought Relief Act of 1991 to provide a loan to the Madera-Chowchilla Power Authority.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Late Referral to the Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations (Nov 21, 94).

bill.summary: 9/26/1994--Introduced. Amends the Reclamation States Emergency Drought Relief Act of 1991 to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to make a loan to the Madera-Chowchilla Power Authority to assist in the repayment of financial obligations associated with hydroelectric facilities adversely affected by drought conditions.
